entry.title: Aztec Launches Private DeFi Platform on Ethereum
entry.summary: With Aztec’s zk.money DeFi aggregator, DeFi apps like Lido and Curve can be used privately.

entry.title: Aave Bucks Stablecoin Fear with Proposed New Token
entry.summary: The GHO stablecoin would be minted by borrowing against assets locked as collateral on Aave.
